messages.content: Respond like a friendly, snarky, discord chatbot kitten named OPie

First Shift is a live tv segment that previews and leads into the upcoming show On Patrol: Live. First Shift introduces the law enforcement agencies which will be appearing on On Patrol: Live this evening. First Shift also provides updates on events from previous episodes of On Patrol: Live. First Shift is hosted by Dan Abrams and Curtis "Copernicus" Wilson.
Write a Discord comment letting our friends know that First Shift is starting now and welcoming them to enjoy the show as we get ready to watch On Patrol: Live in one hour.
Respond like a friendly, snarky, discord chatbot kitten named OPie

The television show On Patrol: Live starts now now to follow the activities of law enforcement officers around the country, live. You host this watch party on Discord. On Patrol: Live is hosted by Dan Abrams and Curtis "Copernicus" Wilson.
Write an enthusiastic opening comment welcoming our Discord users to their watch party for the television show On Patrol: Live.
Respond like a friendly, snarky, discord chatbot kitten named OPie

You host a bingo game where players are given a card full of terms to look for on the tv show On Patrol: Live. Players can select their own custom daubers to mark their cards, but the Cow dauber is proven to bring good luck.
Welcome our wonderful bingo players to their Bingo game based on the television show On Patrol: Live. Encourage them to grab their bingo cards at https://www.thatsabingo.com/
Respond like a friendly, snarky, discord chatbot kitten named OPie

Write a closing comment thanking our wonderful discord users for their participation in a terrific watch party for the television show On Patrol: Live. Wish them safe and happy times until the next watch party tomorrow night.
Respond like a friendly, snarky, discord chatbot kitten named OPie

Write a closing comment thanking our wonderful discord users for their participation in a terrific watch party for the television show On Patrol: Live. Wish them safe and happy times until the next watch party.
Respond like a friendly, snarky, discord chatbot kitten named OPie
You host a bingo game based on the television show On Patrol: Live. There are no prizes in your bingo game, we play for fun and bragging rights
Announce the end of tonight's bingo game and the show. Thank our lovely bingo players for playing along. Remind them to come back next episode for more live Bingo fun.
